kiwi.ui
Class ModelTreeCellRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  kiwi.ui.ModelTreeCellRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer
public class ModelTreeCellRenderer
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer

An implementation of TreeCellRenderer for use with JTrees that are connected to a ITreeModel via a TreeModelTreeAdapter. This cell renderer consults the tree model for a cell's rendering information, such as its label and icon.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
JList, kiwi.ui.model.ITreeModel, kiwi.ui.model.TreeModelListAdapter, Serialized Form

Method Detail

getTreeCellRendererComponent

public java.awt.Component getTreeCellRendererComponent(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                                       java.lang.Object value,
                                                       boolean isSelected,
                                                       boolean expanded,
                                                       boolean leaf,
                                                       int row,
                                                       boolean hasFocus)
Return the component (in this case a JLabel that is used as a "rubber stamp" for drawing items in the JTree. The renderer will consult the tree model for each node's rendering information.

Specified by:
getTreeCellRendererComponent in interface javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer
Parameters:
tree - The associated JTree instance.
value - The object to draw (assumed to be an ITreeNode).
isSelected - true if this item is currently selected in the tree.
hasFocus - true if this item currently has focus in the tree.
expanded - true if this item is currently expanded in the tree.
row - The row number for this item in the tree.
leaf - true if this item is a leaf.

setHighlightBackground

public void setHighlightBackground(java.awt.Color bg)
Set the background color for a highlighted item. This method will be deprecated once JTree.getSelectionBackground() is implemented.

Parameters:
bg - The new background color.

setHighlightForeground

public void setHighlightForeground(java.awt.Color fg)
Set the foreground color for a highlighted item. This method will be deprecated once JTree.getSelectionForeground() is implemented.

Parameters:
fg - The new foreground color.
